Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The exercise - isoproterenol ( E - 1 ) and exercise control ( EC ) groups exercised daily for thirty days on a treadmill at 1 mph , 2 % grade while animals of the sedentary - isoproterenol ( S - I ) group remained sedentary .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| isoproterenol (in the context of the S-I group) |

In this paragraph, the term "isoproterenol" is mentioned in relation to a group of animals (S-I) that remained sedentary. It is not explicitly stated that they have the disease "isoproterenol," but based on the context, it can be inferred that they were given this substance. Therefore, it is considered a valid disease entity in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| isoproterenol (in the context of the S-I group) |

In the paragraph, only the term "isoproterenol" in relation to the S-I group can be considered a disease entity, as it refers to a substance that was given to the animals in this group.
